trans-unit.resname: PCEL·1 | 1996 World Champion | Card Name
trans-unit.source: 1996 World Champion
trans-unit.target: 1996 World Champion

trans-unit.resname: PCEL·1 | 1996 World Champion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cannot be the target of spells or effects. World Champion has power and toughness equal to the life total of target opponent.
trans-unit.target: Cannot be the target of spells or effects. World Champion has power and toughness equal to the life total of target opponent.

trans-unit.resname: PCEL·1 | 1996 World Champion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {0}: Discard your hand to search your library for CARDNAME and reveal it to all players. Shuffle your library and put CARDNAME on top of it. Use this ability only at the beginning of your upkeep, and only if CARDNAME is in your library.
trans-unit.target: {0}: Discard your hand to search your library for CARDNAME and reveal it to all players. Shuffle your library and put CARDNAME on top of it. Use this ability only at the beginning of your upkeep, and only if CARDNAME is in your library.

trans-unit.target: Shichifukujin Dragon

trans-unit.resname: PCEL·2 | Shichifukujin Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, put seven +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME comes into play, put seven +1/+1 counters on it.

trans-unit.resname: PCEL·2 | Shichifukujin Dragon | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {R}{R}{R}, Sacrifice two +1/+1 counters: Put three +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME at end of turn. Play this ability as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {R}{R}{R}, Sacrifice two +1/+1 counters: Put three +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME at end of turn. Play this ability as a sorcery.

trans-unit.resname: PCEL·3 | Proposal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Proposal
trans-unit.target: Proposal

trans-unit.resname: PCEL·3 | Proposal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Allows Richard to propose marriage to Lily. If the proposal is accepted both players win; mix the cards in play, both libraries, and both graveyards as a shared deck.
trans-unit.target: Allows Richard to propose marriage to Lily. If the proposal is accepted both players win; mix the cards in play, both libraries, and both graveyards as a shared deck.

trans-unit.target: Splendid Genesis

trans-unit.resname: PCEL·4 | Splendid Genesis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Shuffle all cards in the game together and deal them into three decks. The game continues with a new player.
trans-unit.target: Shuffle all cards in the game together and deal them into three decks. The game continues with a new player.

trans-unit.source: Sneak into your parents' closet to get a deck. Your new brother is joining the game.

trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast a spell, put a 0/1 colorless Egg artifact creature token onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: PCEL·6 | Robot Chicken | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever an Egg you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, destroy target artifact or creature.
trans-unit.target: Whenever an Egg you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, destroy target artifact or creature.
